config_description: Enables creation of transiently replicated keyspaces on this node. Transient replication is experimental and is not recommended for production use.
developer_understanding_on_working: The 'enable_transient_replication' configuration option allows for the creation of transiently replicated keyspaces on the node. It is checked in the code to ensure that transient replication is enabled in the cassandra.yaml file before allowing the creation of keyspaces with transient replication.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The 'enable_transient_replication' configuration is triggered whenever a new keyspace is created with transient replication or when the replication strategy is validated in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'enable_transient_replication' configuration option is that it enables the experimental feature of transient replication on the node. This feature is not recommended for production use due to its experimental nature and potential impact on data consistency and availability.
